Woobin

Introduction

Woobin is a South Korean singer under Starship Entertainment. He is the main vocalist of the boy group CRAVITY.

He debuted as a member of CRAVITY on April 14, 2020 with the mini album "HIDEOUT : REMEMBER WHO WE ARE".
